posts.post_title: t222 Fatima Player Card Jack Lapp BVG 1.5 ***SOLD***
posts.post_content:
For sale is a t222 1914 Fatima Player Card of Jack Lapp.  It has received a grade of 1.5 from BVG.  Paypal is the preferred method of payment, but other types are accepted.  The price of $60 includes delivery.  The card is pictures below.  Please contact me if you have questions.  Thanks!
Jim

many thanks,Jim
great doing business with you.

all the best,

barry

Jim
many thanks for the Lapp Fatima.
looks great in all ways.
it went to the framer today along with the T5 Lapp which i bought recently from Rhett.
great doing business with an ole UWF buddy.
best,

barry
